titleInfo.title: A Note on a New Existence Result for Reflected BSDES with Interconnected Obstacles

mods.abstract: In this note we prove existence of a solution to a system of Markovian BSDEs with interconnected obstacles. A key feature of our system, and the main novelty of this paper, is that we allow for the driver ƒ<sub>*i*</sub> of the *i*-th component of the *Y* -process to depend on all components of the *Z*-process. This extends the existing theory on reflected BSDEs, which only addresses problems where ƒ<sub>*i*</sub> depends on *Z*<sup>*i*</sup>.
